title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 shows obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') prominently.
OB: Obfuscated classes are displayed in the Open Type dialog.
EB: Obfuscated classes should not be displayed in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
1. Ensure JDK 1.4 is installed
2. Open the Open Type dialog
3. Observe if obfuscated classes are displayed
